article:
Beverly Hills High School is the only major public high school in Beverly Hills, California. It's a famous school for stars. In this school, most students come from rich families and some of them have _ parents. People from Hollywood _ go to Beverly Hills High School to look for future actors or actresses. There are lots of good things about going to this school. There _ a television studio  , a radio station and two theatres in this school. The students make TV programmes and films in their drama  classes. The biggest _ of the school year is the school dance.
In California, children can learn to _ three months before their sixteenth birthday. Lots ofstudents in Beverly Hills High School have their own cars . But if they come to school _ cars, they have to _ a lot of money to park  their cars in the school parking area.
Most children _ going to Beverly Hills High School because it is fun and there is much to do. But some children do not like the school _ their parents don't have enough money to buy thema fast car or expensive clothes.
